reviewText: I am highly addicted to this complete "Farm" series. The main cast is very likeable as people, but approachable as professionals. I bought the whole series and will watch them again.

Great historical overview of rural Victorian Britain - very watchable DVD. The main 'presenters' are interesting and hands-on. I like the way all the heritage experts enter the series in full period costume.

We live in Portugal during the winter months, and we had the good fortune to watch the series "The Victorian Farm" each week.  The quality of the filming and the rebirth of Victorian history was remarkable.  Wonderful for schools or just family viewing.
